title: Easemytrip no convenience fees?
selftext:
Recently saw a podcast of the Easemytrip Founder Nishant Pitti where he claims that there's no convenience fees in Easemytrip but my recent experience says otherwise?

Below i compare trip price in Easemytrip(Pic one) and the indigo app(Pic 2), although Easemytrip is a bit cheaper the dreaded convenience fees is still very much there

Link to the Podcast- https://youtu.be/WgtHo16hXyw
comments: You have used easefly coupon code . Hence convenience fee is added . The default code for no convenience fee is emtncf. Only one code can be used at a time .
You're right but there was an option to choose "No convince" fees earlier but since it wasn't an option i choose another code
